item.title: Application Scheduling and Lifecycle Mangement
item.description: This article describs how to use kubernetes deployments to deploy pods, scale pods, perform rolling updates and rollbacks, carry out resource management, and use ConfigMaps to configurepods using kubectl command and YAML definitions. Run a container Cretae a pod using am imperative command Create pods with kubectl command 1 kubectl run <pod-name> --image=<image-name:image-tag> for instance: 1 kubectl run nginx-pod --image=nginx:alpine Check the pod’s status 1 kubectl describe pod nginx-pod Create pods with declarative management Create a yaml file
